short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens an eBay search for the chosen card on TCG Collector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a deep link to an eBay listings page to card listings on https://www.tcgcollector.com

This extension saves you having to manually navigate to eBay and type in the name and card number to search.

When the extension extracts the name and number from one of the card listing pages (e.g: https://www.tcgcollector.com/cards/intl/shining-fates) it will generate a search URL for your chosen eBay site and append a clickable link to the end of the table row or each card that will open eBay in a new tab with the search pre-filled.
